Class TableHelper.ColumnStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • bradleyross.library.database.TableHelper.ColumnStatus
  • Enclosing class:
    TableHelper

     class TableHelper.ColumnStatus
extends Object
    Encapsulates information on a column in the table.
    Author:
    Bradley Ross
